src_original: yat kiñcid asmin kāye tejas tejogatam ūṣmagatam upagatam upāttaṃ /  tat punaḥ katamat /  yenâyaṃ kāyâtapyate saṃtapyate /
tgt_original: 謂內身中在，內所攝火，火性熱，內之所受。

src_original: yasya côtsadatvāj jvarito jvaritêti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //
bāhyas tejodhātuḥ katamaḥ /  yad bāhyaṃ tejas tejogatam ūṣmagatam upagatam upāttaṃ /
tgt_original: 外火界者，謂大是，淨是，不憎惡是。

src_original: yan manuṣyâraṇīsahagatebhyo garbhalasahagatebhyo vā gomayacūrṇena vā kārpāsapicunâvāsam  anveṣante yad utpannaṃ grāmam api dahati grāmapradeśam api dahati yāvad dvīpaṃ vā
tgt_original: 有時外火界起，起已燒村邑、城郭、山林、曠野，燒彼已，或至道、至水，無受而滅。

src_original: tad yathôrdhvagamā vāyavo 'dhogamāḥ pārśvâśrayāḥ pṛṣṭhâśrayāḥ kukṣigamāḥ śastrakāḥ  kṣurakāḥ sūcakāḥ pippalakā vātâṣṭhīlā vātagulmâśvāsapraśvāsâṅgânusāriṇo vāyavêty ādi /
tgt_original: 謂上風、下風、腹風、行風、掣縮風、刀風、躋風、非道風、節節行風、息出風、息入風，如是比此身中餘在，內所攝風，風性動，內之所受，諸賢！ 是謂內風界。 諸賢！

src_original: santi bahirdhā pūrve vāyavo dakṣiṇāḥ paścimôttarā vāyavaḥ sarajasaḥ arajasaḥ parīttā mahadgatā vāyavêti /
tgt_original: 外風界者，謂大是，淨是，不憎惡是。

src_original: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāvāyuskandhaḥ samudāgataḥ /  vṛkṣâgrān api pātayati /  kuḍyān api parvatâgrān api pātayati /
tgt_original: 諸賢！ 有時外風界起，風界起時撥，屋拔樹，崩山，山巖撥已便止，纖毫不動。
